answers.answer: Hpw far along are you?  My lo had something  called duodenal atresia which means that his stomach and small intestines  were not connected...  They found this via ultrasound..  I carried alot of extra fluid ended up  having my little  early

question: So I have excess fluid since the end of dec it was at a 27 but since then it has went down to a 23 they have said it could be gestational diabetes thats why im doing another test today And Wednesday they said baby love could have a swallowing problem like his trac could be connected to something but that cannot be determined until birth has anyone had this problem?
title: swollowing problem?
